mapper.select: select emp_no, e.cg_no, e.position_no, e.low_dept_no, emp_break, salary, emp_name, birth, cell_phone, p.position_name, c.cg_name, l.low_dept_name from emp e join position p on e.position_no = p.position_no join emp_cg c on e.cg_no = c.cg_no join low_dept l on e.low_dept_no = l.low_dept_no where emp_no = #{emp_no}
mapper.update: update emp set cg_no = #{cg_no}, position_no = #{position_no}, low_dept_no = #{low_dept_no}, emp_break = #{emp_break}, salary = #{salary}, emp_name = #{emp_name}, birth = #{birth}, cell_phone = #{cell_phone} where emp_no = #{emp_no}
